compatibility.notes: ZPL-1.1 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license in all redistributions.
Acknowledge Zope Corporation in advertising materials if applicable.
Clearly separate modifications from the original work.
license.name: ZPL-1.1
obligations: Retain copyright notice and license in redistributions.
Include acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features derived from the software.
Do not use names associated with Zope or Zope Corporation for endorsement without permission.
Package modifications as separate patches and label unofficial distributions.
